pages.title: Diet
pages.text: Maintaining a healthy $(thing)Diet/$ is important, as you can gain additional benefits for eating a variety of foods. The $(thing)Diet/$ menu can be accessed via the button next to the button for this book which shows a hunger shank.$(br2)Note that if you $(bold)$(l:vanilla_changes/death)Die/$, you will lose some progress on your $(thing)Diet/$!

Combining multiple $(thing)Ingredients/$ in $(thing)Meals/$ is significantly more efficient than eating individual items on their own. Searching $(jei) for $(bold)'Meal'/$ will return all foods classified as $(thing)Meals/$.

pages.title: Categories
pages.text: Your $(thing)Diet/$ is split into 5 different $(thing)Categories/$:$(li)Fruits/$$(li)Grains/$$(li)Proteins/$$(li)Vegetables/$$(li)Sugars/$$(br2)Each kind of $(thing)Ingredient/$ belongs to one of these $(thing)Categories/$, and combining $(thing)Ingredients/$ can make foods which give you more than one $(thing)Category/$ at once.

For each $(thing)Category/$ above 80%, you will gain increases to the following stats:$(li)Maximum Health/$$(li)Armor Toughness/$$(li)Knockback Resistance/$$(br2)If you have over 80% in all $(thing)Categories/$, you will also gain additional increases to the following stats:$(li)Attack Damage/$$(li)Attack Speed/$
